name: List
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Table
List
description: Table::List is a special case Array with additional values.

methods.name: token
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Table
List#token
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: token=
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Table
List#token=
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: etag
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Table
List#etag
methods.description: A hash of this page of results.

methods.name: etag=
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Table
List#etag=
methods.description: A hash of this page of results.

methods.name: total
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Table
List#total
methods.description: Total number of tables in this collection.

methods.name: total=
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Table
List#total=
methods.description: Total number of tables in this collection.

methods.name: next?
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Table
List#next?
methods.description: Whether there is a next page of tables.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery
dataset = bigquery.dataset "my_dataset"

tables = dataset.tables
if tables.next?
  next_tables = tables.next
end

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery
dataset = bigquery.dataset "my_dataset"

tables = dataset.tables
if tables.next?
  next_tables = tables.next
end

methods.name: all
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Table
List#all
methods.description:
Retrieves all tables by repeatedly loading #next until #next? returns false. Calls the given block once for each table, which is passed as the parameter.

An Enumerator is returned if no block is given.

This method may make several API calls until all tables are retrieved. Be sure to use as narrow a search criteria as possible. Please use with caution.

examples.caption: Iterating each result by passing a block:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery
dataset = bigquery.dataset "my_dataset"

dataset.tables.all do |table|
  puts table.name
end

examples.caption: Using the enumerator by not passing a block:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery
dataset = bigquery.dataset "my_dataset"

all_names = dataset.tables.all.map do |table|
  table.name
end

examples.caption: Limit the number of API requests made:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery
dataset = bigquery.dataset "my_dataset"

dataset.tables.all(request_limit: 10) do |table|
  puts table.name
end

params.name: request_limit
params.description:
The upper limit of API requests to make
to load all tables. Default is no limit.

params.name: yield
params.description: The block for accessing each table.
